---
title: "Business Population Estimates"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(fsp)

bpe <- get_bpe()

bpe |> 
  dplyr::filter(sic_id %in% c("10", "11"), 
                stringr::str_starts(category, "Employment number")) |> 
  dplyr::group_by(size) |>
  dplyr::summarise(total = sum(value)) |> 
  knitr::kable()


```
